id.description: The package id to use when deploying with format function-technology eg. database-mongo

name.description: The name of the package in user friendly format eg. Database Mongo

description.description: A description of the package in user friendly format eg. For persisting unstructured data

oneOf.description: package fulfills a specific use case

version.description: The current version of the package

dependencies.description: A list of all packages that are required to start up before this package

sharedConfigs.description: A list of all files or directories that should be copied over into the package container
